description: This healthier bliss ball recipe is perfect for summer holidays. It's nutritionally approved for kids and made with juicy in-season mango.
keywords: Bliss & protein ball,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Sesame free,Quick & easy,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Mango,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mango & Coconut Bliss Balls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeCategory: Kids light meal & snack,Kids snack,Snacks,Fresh Food Kids

recipeInstructions.text: Place mango, oats, 1 1/2 cups coconut, chia seeds and turmeric in a food processor and process for 20 seconds or until mixture starts to combine (do not overprocess).
Using damp hands, roll heaped tablespoonfuls of mango mixture into balls to make a total of 20. Place remaining coconut in a shallow bowl, then roll balls in coconut to coat. Serve.
